name: Heist Terminal
description:
one week prototype

The case was to make a hacking minigame for a bank heist game. I tried to make a game that feels somewhat realistic. and I believe I succeeded in that. what do you think?

You need to brute force SSH with hydra and do privilege escalations to turn off the alarm. 

I needed to ensure you couldn't see how to win the game as everything is logged in the terminal.

can you find the hidden game over screen?
